'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A lounge for all the officers of the RDC, where they relax or play hazatoha tournaments.

==Characters==
* [[Lounge server]], sells you a variety of alcohol and snacks. But only if you have at least 1 reputation with the RDC, or are a [[Dwarf]].
